attributes.action: Shut all schools in the uk for the first 2 weeks of January
attributes.additional_details:
No one knows how many people each child/teacher would of came in contact with over the Christmas period , there could be a lot of asymptomatic children/adults that could spread it very rapidly , we all know the virus and the new varient of the virus is starting to get out of control , hence the tighter restrictions and this new tier system. 
Shut all schools In the uk for the first 2 weeks of January and bring in tougher measures to give everyone time to isolate and cut the transmission down
attributes.background: Shut all the schools to keep all our children and the population safe , also to keep the transmission of the virus down.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition, the Government has announced the closure of schools: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home#going-to-school-college-and-university
